atmbranchfinderspring.resourceserver.controllers

Class TemplateController

  • java.lang.Object
    • atmbranchfinderspring.resourceserver.controllers.TemplateController

  • @Controller
public class TemplateController
extends java.lang.Object
    TemplateController returns the Login and Authentication page. It uses Thymeleaf as template-engine.
